item.title: CVE-2024-1175|2024-06-06T03:53:09.201Z -- wppost -- wp-recall%20%E2%80%93%20registration%2C%20profile%2C%20commerce%20%26%20more
item.description: The WP-Recall â€“ Registration, Profile, Commerce & More plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the 'delete_payment' function in all versions up to, and including, 16.26.6. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary payments.
